meanings.definition: Not having been rifled or disturbed
meanings.sent1: The unrifled forest remained peaceful and untouched by humans.
meanings.sent2: The detective found an unrifled safe in the abandoned house.
meanings.sent3: The unrifled cookie jar tempted the mischievous child.
meanings.sent4: Her unrifled emotions finally spilled over in tears.
meanings.sent5: The unrifled snow glistened in the morning sun.

meanings.definition: Not having rifling or grooves inside
meanings.sent1: The unrifled barrel of the gun was smooth to the touch.
meanings.sent2: The antique musket had an unrifled bore.
meanings.sent3: The unrifled straw in the broom made sweeping difficult.
meanings.sent4: His unrifled mind was a blank canvas waiting to be filled.
meanings.sent5: The unrifled pipe produced a different sound than the rifled one.

meanings.definition: Not having been searched or plundered
meanings.sent1: The unrifled treasure chest held secrets waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent2: The explorer stumbled upon an unrifled tomb in the desert.
meanings.sent3: The unrifled room in the old mansion hid a valuable painting.
meanings.sent4: Her unrifled diary contained her deepest thoughts and dreams.
meanings.sent5: The unrifled shipwreck promised untold riches to those who found it.
